description: This file defines a Fragment for displaying, searching, and interacting with favorite notes within an Android application. It manages data loading, user interactions like pinning, favoriting, deleting notes, and updates the UI accordingly.

classes.name: FavoritesFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment to display and manage user's favorite notes, including search, pin/unpin, favorite/unfavorite, and delete functionalities.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the NotesRepository instance when fragment is created.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout, initializes UI components, and sets up the RecyclerView adapter.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Loads data whenever the fragment resumes.

methods.name: onSearchQuery
methods.description: Handles search queries to filter favorite notes.

methods.name: loadData
methods.description: Loads favorite notes from the repository based on the current query and updates the UI.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Shows or hides the loading indicator.

methods.name: onNoteClicked
methods.description: Launches the note editor when a note is clicked.

methods.name: onNoteMenuClicked
methods.description: Shows a popup menu for actions like pin/unpin, favorite/unfavorite, delete.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows confirmation dialog before deleting a note.
